column4: I don't have any thumbnails in nautilus(Feisty) is that a known problem?
you should join the ubuntu+1 channel, I'm not sure it's name though, something like ubuntu+1
there is nobody, who can help me
what isn't thumbnailing exactly, video or pictures?
I'm not sure if this will work, but open a nautilus window (open your home folder)
then go to the Preview tab
Previews are on, for local files only
I have to check, all the video/pictures/SVG's are on your HD, not on the network, right?
yes, they are an my HD
and you have Totem (I think totem is what does the previews) installed still?
